title: ConvertXtoDvD 6.0.0.20 Final + Patcher
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
ConvertXtoDvD 6.0.0.20 Final + Patcher
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Cover Photo > <a href="http://s27.postimg.org/3ww8xorgv/box_closed_HD_125.png">http://s27.postimg.org/3ww8xorgv/box_closed_HD_125.png</a>
Successful Install Windows 8.1 Enterprise > <a href="http://s23.postimg.org/u0534s163/win_8_1_x86_enterprise_convertx2dvd_6_0_0_20.jpg">http://s23.postimg.org/u0534s163/win_8_1_x86_enterprise_convertx2dvd_6_0_0_20.jpg</a>


=====================
SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
=====================

.:::::Hardware:::::.

==> Processor Intel Pentium III / AMD Athlon 
(Intel Pentium 4 / AMD Athlon XP or equivalent recommended)
==> 512 MB RAM with Windows XP 
1 GB RAM with Windows Vista
==> Hard disk drive with at least 4.3 Gbytes free
==> DVD Burner

.:::::Operating System:::::.

==> Windows 10/8.1/8/7/Vista/XP - 32 & 64 bit


=====================
ABOUT ConvertXtoDvD
=====================

==> Convert videos to DVD and watch on any DVD player 
==> Burn automatically to DVD after video conversion
==> Excellent quality and fast converter
==> Edit and customize videos and DVD menus
==> Easy to use, versatile and full of amazing options
==> Convert in one click
==> Ultimate image quality
==> Impressive conversion speed
==> Total control over menu and video edition
==> AVI, MKV, DVD, MOV, Divx, WMV, MTS, M2TS, Mpeg, MP4 to DVD and more (see supported formats)

===============================================================
Create menus & chapters, cut videos, total customization with live preview
Edit your project with the various settings and features listed below. Watch results before converting!
===============================================================
==> (NEW) Create menus with videos and music: menu editor with full customization
==> Integrated video player for live Preview 
==> Cut unwanted parts of the video 
==> Add chapters - automatic or custom
==> (NEW) Add a watermark/copyright
==> Many subtitles supported, convert as soft or hard subs
==> Convert NTSC to PAL and vice-versa
==> Merge function - like for CD1 + CD2
==> Rotate video, add brightness/contrast 
==> (NEW) Add a video intro
===============================================================
Advanced features
Advanced settings for ultimate conversions:
===============================================================
==> 2 pass encoding for enhanced quality
==> Hardware decoding for faster conversions 
==> Video/Audio/Subtitle synchronisation
==> Various audio output formats
==> Image resize filters (lanczos, linear, cubic, etc)
==> (NEW) Image perfection wizard
==> Multiple encoding profiles
==> Shutdown computer when finished
==> Multi-core processor optimized
==> (NEW) Audio normalizer
==> Padding and cropping
==> De-interlacing
==> Batch converter
==> Multiple conversions processed simultaneously 
==> Quality advisor
===============================================================
Burn to DVD, create ISO file or store on PC
Create DVD video standard videos (vob files) to guarantee compatibility with all home DVD players.
===============================================================
==> Compatible with any disks 
(see supported format tab)
==> ISO output available
==> NTSC + PAL region formats
==> 16:9 widescreen + 4:3 fullscreen
==> Burn multiple copies
==> VSO burning engine included
==> Various SD resolutions available
==> Custom output size
==> Burn on DVD/USB key or store on PC

*ConvertXtoDVD was previously named DivxToDVD.
**ConvertXtoDVD includes everything you need, no extra downloads or external codecs needed.
===============================================================

=====================
INSTALLATION NOTES
=====================

==> Disconnect the internet
==> Install the Program
==> Tick the 3 boxes to remove previous ConvertXtoDvD program files
==> Don't Launch/Run the Application
==> Copy PATCH to install directory
==> Run PATCH as administrator to Activate
==> Enjoy ... KEEP INTERNET OFF
==> Open program click - Default Settings - General - untick Check internet for updates regularly
and tick the box Do not prompt for updates
==> KEEP INTERNET OFF
==> Go into your firewall settings and block ConvertXtoDvd
==> Once all above is done. You can now TURN INTERNET ON
